mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOIM( MOIM_IDX, MOIM_NAME, UNIVNAME, MOIM_CATE, USER_ID, MOIM_INTRO) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MOIM_IDX)+1,0) FROM MOIM) , #{moim_name}, #{univname}, #{moim_cate}, #{user_id}, #{moim_intro})

SELECT MAX(moim_idx) FROM moim
INSERT INTO moimuser(moim_idx, user_id) VALUES(#{moim_idx}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT MOIM.MOIM_IDX, MOIM.MOIM_NAME, MOIM.UNIVNAME, MOIM.MOIM_CATE, MOIM.USER_ID, MOIM.MOIM_INTRO, MUSER.USER_NAME, MUSER.USER_CATE FROM MOIM,MUSER WHERE MOIM.UNIVNAME=MUSER.UNIVNAME AND INSTR(MUSER.USER_CATE,MOIM.MOIM_CATE)>0 ORDER BY MOIM_IDX ASC

SELECT DISTINCT moim.moim_idx, moim.moim_name, moim.moim_cate, moim.user_id, moim.moim_intro, moim.univname, muser.user_name FROM moim, muser, ( SELECT moim_idx FROM moimuser WHERE user_id != #{user_id} ) a WHERE moim.univname= #{univname} AND INSTR(#{user_cate}, moim.moim_cate)>0 AND moim.user_id = muser.user_id AND moim.moim_idx = a.moim_idx ORDER BY moim_idx ASC
SELECT moim.moim_idx, moim.moim_name, moim.moim_cate, moim.user_id, moim.moim_intro, moim.univname, muser.user_name FROM moim, muser WHERE moim_idx = #{moim_idx} AND moim.user_id = muser.user_id
SELECT MOIM_NAME, MOIM_CATE, MOIM_INTRO FROM MOIM WHERE MOIM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search_moim_name}||'%' OR MOIM_CATE LIKE '%'||#{search_moim_name}||'%'

SELECT MOIM_NAME, USER_ID, MOIM_INTRO,MOIM_IDX,MOIM_CATE,UNIVNAME FROM MOIM WHERE (MOIM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search_moim_name}||'%' AND UNIVNAME=#{user_univname}) OR (MOIM_CATE LIKE '%'||#{search_moim_name}||'%' AND UNIVNAME=#{user_univname})
